header.listHead: By using this application, you agree to the following terms:

content.title: Educational Use Only
content.body: This application is a non-commercial project created to explore and learn about web development technologies. It is not intended for public use, nor does it provide any real service or guarantee.

content.title: No Guarantee of Service
content.body: The application may be modified or taken down at any time. There is no assurance of uptime, performance, or data preservation.

content.title: User Conduct
content.body: Users are expected to behave respectfully. Any abusive, illegal, or inappropriate use is not allowed and may result in restricted access.

content.title: Privacy of Your Rooms
content.body: Any rooms you create here are strictly your private little corners of the internet â€” no data is stored or tracked. So go wild, your secrets are safe! Only messages you send in the General Chat get a temporary backstage pass to storage.

content.title: Data Use
content.body: Only the username you provide and the messages sent in the General Chat are temporarily stored. No sensitive personal data is collected or used.

content.title: Liability
content.body: The developer is not liable for any damages or losses resulting from the use of this application.

footer.body: If you do not agree with these terms, please discontinue using the application.
